testcase.classname: F01_Registration | user can register a new account
testcase.name: user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user should go to registration page...................................passed Then validate that user could navigate register page successfully...........passed When user could select on gender type.......................................passed When user could enter valid firstname "beshoy" and lastname "nady"..........passed When user could enter date of birth.........................................passed When user could enter valid Email...........................................passed When user may enter name of company "Egal's company"........................passed When user could enter valid password........................................passed When user colud enter valid confirmation password...........................passed When user could press on register button....................................passed Then validate that user could register a new account successfully...........passed

testcase.classname: F02_login page | user should login page with his valid email and password
testcase.name: user could login successfully with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user could enter valid email and valid password........................passed And user could press on login button........................................passed Then validate that user navigate home page successfully.....................passed

testcase.classname: F03_recovery password | user could recover his password successfully by valid email
testcase.name: user could recover his password by email
testcase.system-out: Given user should press on forget your password.............................passed When user enter his valid email.............................................passed When user click on recover button...........................................passed Then validate that the message of recovery is displayed.....................passed

testcase.classname: F04_ search feature | validate that search works exactly
testcase.name: user could search on any product
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user could enter valid email and valid password........................passed And user could press on login button........................................passed When user could go to field of search.......................................passed And user could search with valid product "macbook"..........................passed Then verify that the user could find a product relative for result "macbook".passed

testcase.classname: F04_ search feature | validate that search works exactly
testcase.name: user could search for product with sku
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user could enter valid email and valid password........................passed And user could press on login button........................................passed When user could search with valid sku "SCI_FAITH"...........................passed Then click on picture of product to navigate details for product............passed And verify that user could find product relative for sku of result "SCI_FAITH".passed And verify that main sku relative for sku for searching product "SCI_FAITH".passed

testcase.classname: F05_currency feature | user could change currency
testcase.name: user could select on currency
testcase.system-out: When user select on euro currency...........................................passed Then verify that the changing of currency is displayed successfully.........passed

testcase.classname: F06 categories feature | choose main category and sub category if found successfully
testcase.name: user could choose random main category and sub category if found
testcase.system-out: When user selects random category from main category........................passed Then verify that page of category is displayed..............................passed And verify that the title of category belongs to the title of random category.passed

testcase.classname: F07_filter feature | can filter products by color
testcase.name: user can filter products by using color in shoes subcategory
testcase.system-out: Given user should hover Apparel category and click on shoes subcategory.....passed When user choose filter the products by color...............................passed Then validate that the product is displayed relative the color which is choosen.passed

testcase.classname: F08_tags feature| ensure that popular tags work correctly
testcase.name: user can search on products by using tags
testcase.system-out: Given user selects random category from main category.......................passed And user should scroll down to get list of tags.............................passed When user selects random tags...............................................passed Then validate that tag is displayed relative products.......................passed

testcase.classname: F09_Wishlist | user could add products in wishlist
testcase.name: user could add product to store in wishlist successfully and quantity is increased
testcase.system-out: Given user could scroller down until gets the list of products..............passed When user could press on wishlist button where it exists below the product..passed Then verify that the successful message appears after pressing on the button.passed When user scroller up wishlist where exist on Tab on the top of the page that ensure the message dissapear.passed Then verify that the quantity of wishlist bigger than zero..................passed

testcase.name: user could select different products and do comparing between them

testcase.classname: F12 create success order| validate that create order successfully
testcase.name: : user could make order by clicking on checkout
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user could enter valid email and valid password........................passed And user could press on login button........................................passed Given user could go to field of search......................................passed And user could search with valid product "macbook"..........................passed And user select products and click it.......................................passed When user could click on add cart shopping button...........................passed And user navigate to shopping cart page to make order.......................passed And user should agree with the terms of service before pressing checkout....passed And user could press on checkout button to make order.......................passed And user select his country.................................................passed And user should enter his city..............................................passed And user should enter his address...........................................passed And user should enter his postalCode........................................passed And user could phone number.................................................passed And create successful order.................................................passed Then validate that create order is made successfully........................passed
